text: Arthur's Hallowed Ground is a 1982 British TV film directed by Freddie Young. ==Cast== *Jimmy Jewel *Vas Blackwood *Jean Boht *David Swift *Bernard Gallagher ==Production== Goldcrest Films invested £319,000 in the film and earned £265,000 causing them a loss of £54,000. ==References== ==External links== *Arthur's Hallowed Ground at Letterbox *Review at Los Angeles Times *Review at New York Times *Arthur's Hallowed Ground at IMDb Category:1982 television films Category:1982 films
title: Arthur's Hallowed Ground
